data.comment: The big names in today's match at American Express Community Stadium have now been confirmed.
Today's referee, Stuart Attwell, has blown to start the match.
In the minute 1, Throw-in for Liverpool in their own half.
Free kick for Liverpool in their own half.
Corner awarded to Liverpool.
In the minute 3, Liverpool's Mohamed Salah misses with an attempt on goal.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Falmer.
Can Brighton get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Liverpool's half?
In the minute 6, Stuart Attwell signals a free kick to Brighton in their own half.
Diogo Jota (Liverpool) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Liverpool have been awarded a corner by Stuart Attwell.
In the minute 8, Roberto Firmino (Liverpool) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Brighton awarded a throw-in in their own half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 10, Brighton are coming forward and Aaron Connolly gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Stuart Attwell awards Liverpool a goal kick.
Ball safe as Liverpool is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 12, Free kick Brighton.
Adam Webster for Brighton is whistled offside.
Throw-in for Brighton in the half of Liverpool.
In the minute 14, Throw-in for Brighton at American Express Community Stadium.
Liverpool to take a throw-in in Brighton territory.
Throw-in Brighton.
In the minute 15, Stuart Attwell signals a free kick to Liverpool.
Brighton have a dangerous throw-in.
Stuart Attwell signals a throw-in for Brighton, close to Liverpool's area.
In the minute 18, Liverpool needs to be cautious. Brighton have an attacking throw-in.
Corner awarded to Brighton.
Brighton have been given a penalty...
In the minute 20, Neal Maupay (Brighton) places the ball on the penalty spot ... And fails to net!
Liverpool have a goal kick.
Stuart Attwell awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 21, Ball safe as Liverpool is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Stuart Attwell signals a Liverpool throw-in in Brighton's half.
Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to Neal Maupay for Brighton who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
In the minute 25, Liverpool to take a throw-in in Brighton territory.
Brighton awarded a free kick in their own half.
The home team has substituted Neal Maupay with Leandro Trossard. Graham Potter is thus making his first change.
In the minute 26, Stuart Attwell signals a free kick to Liverpool in their own half.
Aaron Connolly (Brighton) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Throw-in for Liverpool at American Express Community Stadium.
In the minute 29, Throw-in Brighton.
Throw-in for Brighton close to the penalty box.
Liverpool awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 31, Throw-in for Liverpool in their own half.
Brighton are pushing forward but Leandro Trossard's finish is wide of the goal.
Goal kick for Liverpool at American Express Community Stadium.
In the minute 34, Stuart Attwell blows against Liverpool's Mohamed Salah for offside.
Stuart Attwell awards the away team a throw-in.
Throw-in for Liverpool in their own half.
In the minute 37, Ball goes out of play for a Liverpool goal kick.
Stuart Attwell signals a Brighton throw-in in Liverpool's half.
Danny Welbeck for Brighton gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
In the minute 38, Ball goes out of play for a Liverpool goal kick.
Can Liverpool get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Brighton's half?
Brighton awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 41, Free kick for Liverpool in their own half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Takumi Minamino for Liverpool drives towards goal at American Express Community Stadium. But the finish is unsuccessful.
In the minute 42, Yves Bissouma is writhing in pain and play has been suspended for a few moments.
Throw-in for Liverpool in the half of Brighton.
Stuart Attwell awards Liverpool a goal kick.
In the minute 45, Yves Bissouma is back on the pitch.
Liverpool awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 45, The fourth official's board shows 2 minutes, which will be added to the 1st half.
Stuart Attwell signals a free kick to Liverpool in their own half.
Free kick for Brighton in their own half.
In the minute 45, The first-half has come to a close in Falmer.
Joel Veltman (Brighton) has received a first yellow card.
The whistle has gone to start the second-half.
In the minute 46, Throw-in Liverpool.
Jurgen Klopp is making the team's first substitution at American Express Community Stadium with Jordan Henderson replacing Neco Williams.
Throw-in for Liverpool in the half of Brighton.
Can Liverpool get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Brighton's half?
In the minute 50, Liverpool's Diogo Jota gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Can Liverpool capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Brighton's half?
Brighton awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 52, Throw-in for Liverpool at American Express Community Stadium.
Free kick for Liverpool in their own half.
Danny Welbeck of Brighton smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
In the minute 55, Liverpool to take a throw-in in Brighton territory.
Free kick for Brighton in the half of Liverpool.
Throw-in high up the field for Brighton in Falmer.
In the minute 57, Liverpool have a goal kick.
In Falmer Brighton attack through Solly March. The finish is off target, however.
Goal kick for Liverpool at American Express Community Stadium.
In the minute 59, Ball safe as Brighton is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Diogo Jota scores to make it 0-1 at American Express Community Stadium.
Great play from Mohamed Salah to set up the goal.
In the minute 61, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Liverpool awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Leandro Trossard of Brighton is pulled up for offside.
In the minute 63, Adam Lallana is on a sub for Aaron Connolly for Brighton.
Brighton needs to be cautious. Liverpool have an attacking throw-in.
The away team replace Mohamed Salah with Sadio Mane.
In the minute 65, In Falmer a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Can Liverpool capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Brighton's half?
Stuart Attwell signals a free kick to Brighton in their own half.
In the minute 68, It's a goal kick for the home team in Falmer.
In Falmer, Roberto Firmino of Liverpool is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Liverpool have been awarded a corner by Stuart Attwell.
In the minute 71, Stuart Attwell awards the home team a throw-in.
Free kick for Brighton in the half of Liverpool.
Alireza Jahanbakhsh is replacing Adam Lallana for the home team.
In the minute 72, The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Danny Welbeck.
Jurgen Klopp (Liverpool) is making a third substitution, with Curtis Jones replacing James Milner.
Brighton's Solly March gets in a shot on goal at American Express Community Stadium. But the effort is unsuccessful.
In the minute 76, Throw-in for Liverpool at American Express Community Stadium.
Brighton's Danny Welbeck looks ok and returns to the pitch.
Brighton awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 77, Stuart Attwell waits before resuming play because Nathaniel Phillips for Liverpool is still down.
Nathaniel Phillips returns to the field for Liverpool after picking up a slight injury.
Brighton have been awarded a corner by Stuart Attwell.
In the minute 81, Brighton's Solly March breaks free at American Express Community Stadium. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Liverpool have a goal kick.
Stuart Attwell signals a free kick to Liverpool.
In the minute 82, Ben White (Brighton) gets a yellow card.
Sadio Mane for the away team is judged to be offside.
In Falmer a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 85, Stuart Attwell signals a free kick to Brighton in their own half.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Falmer.
Ball safe as Brighton is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 88, Corner awarded to Brighton.
Free kick for Liverpool in their own half.
Goal kick for Liverpool at American Express Community Stadium.
Free kick for Liverpool in their own half.
5 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
Brighton have been awarded a penalty...
Brighton awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Stuart Attwell signals a Liverpool throw-in in Brighton's half.
Throw-in for Brighton in the half of Liverpool.
Brighton drive upfield and Alireza Jahanbakhsh gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Liverpool defender.
Corner awarded to Brighton.
In Falmer, Adam Webster (Brighton) misses the target with a header.
Ball goes out of play for a Liverpool goal kick.
That's full-time at American Express Community Stadium. The final score is 1-1.
Liverpool's Alisson has been booked in Falmer.
The match is now all square at 1-1 thanks to a penalty from Pascal Gross.
